column4: Now that you mentioned emacs and vim... what would you suggest for PHP? I'm used to writing with TextMate on a mac but I've been thinking about seeing what's so great about vim and emacs...
I really like using Emacs, although you do need to learn a bit in order to make the most of it.
Hmm, I don't know, I've never bothered to set it up. I use tags to jump around to function definitions a lot, though.
